headline: Con Ed (ED) Q1 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Con Ed (ED) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Consolidated Edison (ED) Q1 Earnings Lag Estimates
summary: Con Ed (ED) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -2.17% and 8.98%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Con Ed: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NEW YORK (AP) — Consolidated Edison Inc. ED) on Thursday reported first-quarter profit of $791 million. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had net income of $2.25.

headline: CON EDISON REPORTS 2025 FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) today reported 2025 first quarter net income for common stock of $791 million or $2.26 a share compared with $720 million or $2.08 a share in the 2024 first quarter. Adjusted earnings (non-GAAP) were $792 million or $2.26 a share in the 2025 period compared with $742 million or $2.15 a share in the 2024 period.
